text: Valyantsin Byalkevich (; 27 January 1973 â€“ 1 August 2014), also sometimes spelled "Valiantsin Bialkevich") was a Belarusian football player. He is known for being a member of the Ukrainian club Dynamo Kyiv from 1996 to 2008 and their all-time leader in assists. Byalkevich died on 1 August 2014, after suffering an aneurysm. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Deaths from aneurysm Category:Sportspeople from Minsk
title: Valyantsin Byalkevich
